query:
SELECT
                    u.id as "id: UserId",
                    u.uid,
                    u.name,
                    u.picture_url
                FROM
                    users u
                INNER JOIN
                    users_groups ug ON
                        ug.user_id = u.id
                WHERE
                    ug.group_id = $2 AND
                    EXISTS (
                        SELECT
                        FROM
                            users_groups viewer_groups
                        WHERE
                            viewer_groups.user_id = $1 AND
                            viewer_groups.group_id = $2
                    )
                ORDER BY
                    u.created_at
